step3: Of note is that it now has an online multiplayer mode. Also, there's the new TecoGamePad feature, which allows you to turn your smartphone into a gamepad There are a total of 48 levels in the game. step5: Once you complete co-op mode, you get to unlock Battle Mode wherein you can compete with another group of friends. Lastly, there's Endless Mode that lets you play through all the levels again to aim for the highest scores you can.
